item: AC Panel labelled and verified as per IWO
Generator hook-up and transfer switch installed
Tower lighting controller wired and manual left on site
Interior Master Ground Bar installed and extended to external ground ring
AC ground installed and separate from other grounds
Transmission lines cables grounded as per Rogers Network Standards
Composite cables are grounded as per Rogers Network Standards
NO-OX applied on all ground / terminations. No loose connections
Spare fibres managed and label appropriately
AC Meter identified with Rogers label when not on Rogers owned shelter or cabinet.
For remote AC Meter installations, location of meter identified in shelter.
Urban Site grounding completed as per drawing
Transmission Line grounding completed as per drawing
